answers.answer: Hi there. Muscle spasm can be caused due to muscle overuse, strenuous exercise,  dehydration, electrolytes depletion, anemia, diabetes, and atherosclerosis. It may be a part of nervous system diseases like multiple sclerosis or spinal cord injury. Also worth mentioning are kidney disease, hypothyroidism. Certain investigations need to be carried out like complete blood count for all the above mentioned systemic conditions, thyroid function tests, electromyography etc.Consult a neurologist and get these evaluated at the earliest lest anything important is missed out.
